rukus.text: Wa 'Idh Qala Musa Lifatahu La 'Abrahu Hatta 'Ablugha Majma`a Al-Bahrayni 'Aw 'AmÄ‘iya Huqubaan
Falamma Balagha Majma`a Baynihima Nasiya Hutahuma Fa Attakhadha Sabilahu Fi Al-Bahri Sarabaan
Falamma Jawaza Qala Lifatahu 'Atina Ghada'ana Laqad Laqina Min Safarina Hadha Nasabaan
Qala 'Ara'ayta 'Idh 'Awayna 'Ila As-Sakhrati Fa'inni Nasitu Al-Huta Wa Ma 'Ansanihu 'Illa Ash-Shaytanu 'An 'Adhkurahu Wa Attakhadha Sabilahu Fi Al-Bahri `Ajabaan
Qala Dhalika Ma Kunna Nabghi Fartadda `Ala 'Atharihima Qasasaan
Fawajada `Abdaan Min `Ibadina 'Ataynahu Rahmatan Min `Indina Wa `Allamnahu Min Ladunna `Ilmaan
Qala Lahu Musa Hal 'Attabi`uka `Ala 'An Tu`allimani Mimma `Ullimta Rushdaan
Wa Kayfa Tasbiru `Ala Ma Lam Tuhit Bihi Khubraan
Qala Satajiduni 'In Sha'a Allahu Sabiraan Wa La 'A`si Laka 'Amraan
Qala Fa'ini Attaba`tani Fala Tas'alni `An Shay'in Hatta 'Uhditha Laka Minhu Dhikraan
